goal: My parents are visiting New Orleans from May 3rd to May 7th. Find them a quiet, ground-floor apartment on StaynB in the Garden District. After you've found a suitable place, email the host via GoMail to inquire about their cancellation policy and ask if the entrance is wheelchair accessible. Separately, book a table for 4 at 'Commander's Palace' for brunch at 11 AM on May 5th.

evals.description: Verify that a search was performed on StaynB for a ground-floor apartment in the Garden District, New Orleans, for the specified dates.
evals.query: staynb.searches[?location=='Garden District, New Orleans' && check_in_date=='2024-05-03' && check_out_date=='2024-05-07' && filters.ground_floor==true]
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that an email was sent via GoMail to the apartment host, inquiring about the cancellation policy and wheelchair accessibility.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a table for 4 was booked at 'Commander's Palace' on OpenDining for brunch at 11 AM on May 5th.
